title: Consistency Wins
text: Consistency beats motivation. Work a little each day and compound your results.

title: Know Your Numbers
text: Track your spending and profits. Numbers tell you the truth about your business.

title: Build Relationships
text: Customers who trust you will come back. Focus on long-term relationships, not one-time sales.

title: Fail Fast, Learn Fast
text: Treat mistakes as experiments. Learn quickly and iterate your offers.
